maqras.text: aur agar hum un par rahem farmaaye aur un ki taklife door karde, to ye to apni apni sarkashi mein jam kar aur behekne lage
aur hum ne unhe azaab mein bhi pakda, ta-hum ye log na to apne parvardigaar ke saamne jhuke aur na hee aajizi eqtiyaar ki
yahaan tak ke jab hum ne, un par saqt azaab ka, darwaaza qol diya, to osi waqt fauran mayoos ho gaye
wo Allah hai jis ne tumhaare liye, kaan aur aankhe aur dil paida kiye, magar tum bahuth hee kam shukr karte ho
aur wahi hai jis ne tumhe paida kar ke zameen mein phaila diya aur osi ki taraf tum jama kiye jaoge
aur ye wahi hai jo jilaata aur maarta hai aur raath din ke raddo badal ka muqtaar bhi wahi hai, kya tum ko samajh boojh nahi
balke un logo ne bhi waisi hee baath kahi, jo agle kehte chale aaye
ke kya jab hum mar kar mitthi aur haddi ho jayenge, kya phir bhi hum zaroor uthaaye jayenge
hum se aur hamaare baap dadaao se, pehle hee se ye waada hota chala ayaa hai, kuch nahi, ye to sirf agle logo ke afsaane hai
pochiye to sahih, ke zameen aur us ki kul cheeze kis ki hai? batlaao agar jaante ho
fauran jawaab denge ke Allah ki, keh dijiye ke phir tum nasihath kyo nahi haasil karte
daryaaft ki jiye ke saatho asmaano ka aur bahuth ba azmath arsh ka rab kaun hai
wo log jawaab denge ke Allah hee hai, keh dijiye ke phir tum kyo nahi darte
pochiye ke tamaam cheezo ka eqtiyaar kis ke haath mein hai? ao panaah deta hai aur jis ke muqaable mein koyi panaah nahi diya jaata, agar tum jaante ho, to batla do
yahi jawaab denge ke Allah hee hai, keh dijiye, phir tum kidhar se jaadu kar diye jaate ho
haq ye hai ke hum ne unhe haq pahoncha diya hai aur ye beshak jhute hai

na to Allah ne kisi ko bete banaya aur na us ke saath aur koyi maboodh hai, warna har maboodh apni maqlooq ko liye liye phirta aur har ek dosre par chad daudta, jo ausaaf ye batlaate hai, un se Allah paak(aur be niyaaz) hai
wo ghaayeb haazir jaanne waala hai aur jo shirk ye karte hai, us se baalaatar hai
aap dua kare ke aye mere parvardigaar! agar tu mujhe wo dikhaaye jis ka waada unhe diya ja raha hai
to aye rab! tu mujhe un zaalimo ke gruh mein na karna
hum jo kch waade unhe de rahe hai, sab aap ko dikha dene par yaqinan qaadir hai
buraayi ko us tariqe se door kare, jo saraasar bhalaayi waala ho, jo kuch ye bayaan karte hai, hum ba-qoobi waaqif hai
aur dua kare ke aye mere parvardigaar! main shaitaano ke was-waso se teri panaah chaahta hoon
aur aye rab main teri panaah chahta hoon ke wo mere paas aa jaaye
yahaan tak ke jab un mein se kisi ko mauth aane lagti hai, to kehta hai, aye mere parvardigaar! mujhe waapas lauta de
ke apni chohdi hoyi dunya mein ja kar nek amaal karlo, har giz aisa nahi hoga, ye to sirf ek qaul hai, jis ka ye qaayal hai, un ke pusht to ek hijaab hai, un ke dubaara ji uthne ke din tak
pas jab ke soor phoonk diya jayega, us din na to aapas ke rishtedaar hee rahenge aur na aapas ki poch gaj
jin ki taraazu ka palla bhaari ho gaya, wo to najaath waale ho gaye
aur jin ke taraazu ka palla halka ho gaya, ye hai wo jinhone apna nuqsaan aap kar liya, jo hamesha ke liye jahannam waasil hoye
un ke chehro ko aag jhulasti rahegi aur wo wahaan badh shakal bane hoye honge
kya meri aayate tumhaare saamne tilaawath nahi ki jaati thi? phir bhi tum unhe jhutlaate thein
kahenge ke aye parvardigaar! hamaari badh-baqti hum par ghaalib aa gayi (waaqeyi) hum thein hee gumraah
aye hamaare parvardigaar hamein yahaan se najaath de, agar ab bhi hum aisa hee kare, to beshak hum zaalim hai
Allah ta’ala farmaayega, phit kaare hoye yaheen pade raho aur mujh se kalaam na karo
mere bandho ki ek jamaath thi jo baraabar yahi kehti rahi ke aye hamaare parvardigaar! hum imaan la chuke hai, tu hamein baqsh aur hum par rahem farma, tu sab meherbaano se zyaada meherbaan hai
(lekin) tum unhe mazaaq mein hee udaate rahe yahaan tak ke (is mashghale ne) tum ko meri yaad (bhi) bhula di aur tum un se mazaaq hee karte rahe
main ne aaj unhe un ke us sabr ka badhla de diya hai, ke wo qaatir qaah apni muraad ko pahonch chuke hai
Allah ta’ala daryaafth farmayega ke tum zameen mein ba-etebaar barso ki ginti ke, kis qadar rahe
wo kahenge ek din ya ek din se bhi kam, ginti ginne waalo se bhi poch li jiye
Allah ta’ala farmayega fi l waaqe tum wahaa bahuth hee kam rahe ho, aye kaash ke tum ose pehle hee se jaan lete
kya tum ye gumaan kiye hoye ho ke hum ne tumhe yo hee bekaar paida kiya hai aur ye ke tum hamaari taraf lautaaye hee na jaoge
Allah ta’ala saccha baadshah hai, wo badi bulandi waala hai, us ke siva koyi maboodh nahi, wahi buzrug arsh ka maalik hai
jo shaqs Allah ke saath kisi dosre maboodh ko pukaare jis ki koyi daleel us ke paas nahi, pas us ka hisaab to us ke rab ke upar hee hai, beshak kaafir log najaath se mehroom hai
aur kaho ke aye mere rab! tu baqsh aur rahem kar aur tu sab meherbaano se behtar meherbaani karne waala hai
